definition: A record or outcome obtained after a formal evaluation process, typically used to assess the performance or knowledge of an individual in a specific subject or field. It is commonly used in educational or professional contexts to refer to the results of an examination, test, or assessment.

examples.english: The exam result was very good.

examples.german: Sie war mit ihrem Prüfungsergebnis zufrieden.
examples.english: She was satisfied with her exam result.

examples.german: Das Prüfungsergebnis wird nächste Woche bekannt gegeben.
examples.english: The exam result will be announced next week.

examples.german: Das Prüfungsergebnis wird in Prozent angegeben.
examples.english: The exam result is given in percentage.
